data.name: ValidationPurpose.Description
data.value: You have added H5Ps as external learning material. H5Ps must first be checked for their functionality before they can be successfully used in a learning environment. This check determines whether points can be earned within the H5P by answering questions (e.g., H5P Interactive Video), which makes the H5P completable (displayed as a completable H5P = ), or whether it is a non-completable H5P where points are awarded simply by opening it (e.g., H5P Image Slider) (displayed as a non-completable H5P = ). It is also possible that an H5P cannot be displayed or is faulty (displayed as a defective H5P = ). You can find more information here.
